Device and location from most recent act: Device and location from most recent activity.
Short text shown when your site appears: Short text shown when your site appears in search results. Used when a page has no description of its own. Keep it under 160 characters. Example: "Buy from any store worldwide. We deliver to your door."
The \"content\" value from the meta tag: The "content" value from the meta tag Bing gives you when you add your site. Example: 1234567890ABCD. Leave empty if not using Bing Webmaster Tools.
The "content" value from the meta tag Google gives you when you add your site. Example: abc123xyz. Leave empty if not using Google Search Console.
The image shown when a page or post is s: The image shown when a page or post is shared on social media (Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp). Used when a page or post has no image of its own. Recommended size: 1200√ó630 pixels. Leave empty to show no image.
These settings apply across your entire: These settings apply across your entire site. Individual pages and blog posts can override some of these. Used by search engines (Google, Bing) and social networks (Facebook, Twitter) when your links are shared.
Your Twitter/X username without @. Examp: Your Twitter/X username without @. Example: wasetzon. Shown when links are shared on Twitter.
Schedule daily rate fetch via Laravel sc: Schedule daily rate fetch via Laravel scheduler (php artisan schedule:run).

Shown when no logo image is uploaded.

Test mode notice: This is a UI/UX test page ‚Äî no data will be saved to the database.
Thanks for signing up! Before getting st: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
This is a secure area of the application: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
This will call open.er-api.com and updat: This will call open.er-api.com and update the stored rates. Manual overrides will be preserved.
Three simple steps and your order is on: Three simple steps and your order is on its way
Tip 1: 1) All fields are optional, but complete details like color and size speed up processing.
Tip 2: 2) The clearer your specifications, the faster and more accurately we purchase and ship your order.
Tip 3: 3) When you enter a price in any currency, the system calculates the SAR value automatically.
Tip 4: 4) After clicking Submit Order you will be taken to your order tracking page.
Tip 5: 5) Attaching files is optional. Max 1 file per product, 10 files per order. After submitting, you can add unlimited files.
Tip 6: 6) Don't forget to click the submit button at the bottom of the page.
Tip 7: 7) To clear all entered data and start fresh, click the reset link at the bottom.
Tips hidden for 30 days: Tips will not be shown for 30 days

caldue1.placeholder_general_notes: You can add general notes for the order, such as requesting product photography service, extra packaging, or merging with another order, etc.
caldue1.placeholder_notes: e.g., If blue is not available choose green
caldue1.placeholder_url: Paste product link (or describe it if no link)
caldue1.rate_limit_exceeded: You have exceeded the allowed order limit (:limit orders/hour)
caldue1.tips_hidden_30_days: Tips will be hidden for 30 days
caldue1.tips_tip1: All fields are optional, but entering complete data like color and size, or a detailed description for complex products, speeds up processing your order.
caldue1.tips_tip2: The clearer the specifications, the more accurately products are purchased and your order is shipped faster, avoiding delays due to missing information.
caldue1.tips_tip3: When entering a price in any currency, the system automatically calculates product values in SAR. If left empty, we calculate manually and respond later on the order page.
caldue1.tips_tip4: After clicking 'Submit Order' you will be redirected to the order page, which is the most important page to track your order status.
caldue1.tips_tip5: Attaching images or explanatory files is optional, preferred for complex products. Only one file per product is allowed, with a maximum of 10 files per order before submission.
caldue1.tips_tip6: Don't forget to click the 'Submit' button at the bottom of the page to save the order and add it to your account.
caldue1.tips_tip7: To clear all entered data and start fresh, click the 'Clear All Products' link at the bottom of the page.

composer1zzz.tip_1: All fields are optional, but entering complete data such as color and size, or a descriptive explanation for complex products, speeds up processing your order.
composer1zzz.tip_2: The clearer the specifications, the more accurately products are purchased and your order is shipped faster, avoiding delays due to missing information.
composer1zzz.tip_3: When entering a price in any currency, the system automatically calculates product value in riyals. If left empty, we calculate it manually and respond later on the order page.
composer1zzz.tip_4: After clicking "Submit Order" you will be redirected to the order page, which is the most important page to track your order status.
composer1zzz.tip_5: Attaching photos or explanatory files is optional and recommended for complex products. Only one file per product is allowed, with a maximum of 10 files per order before submission.
composer1zzz.tip_6: Don't forget to click the "Submit" button at the bottom of the page to save the order and add it to your account.
composer1zzz.tip_7: To clear all entered data and start over, click the "Clear All Entered Products" link at the bottom of the page.

order.success_message:
You will now be redirected to your order page to follow up and communicate with our team via comments.

We will review your order and get back to you within hours with product prices and service fees. You will receive email notifications for any new reply (check your Spam folder).
order.success_go_to_order: Go to follow up your order now
order.duplicate_prefilled: Form pre-filled from your previous order.
order.max_files_exceeded: You can attach a maximum of 10 files.
order.max_products_reached: You've reached the maximum of :max products per order.
order.modal_email_prompt: Enter your email address to continue.
order.modal_info: Your order is saved. Sign in and it will be submitted automatically.
order.modal_signin_title: Sign in to place your order
order.notes_placeholder: E.g. if blue is unavailable, choose green
order.rate_limit_exceeded: You've exceeded the order limit (:max orders/hour). Contact us for a higher limit.
order.tips_body: Add product links from any store. Our team handles purchasing and shipping. You can also describe a product if no link is available.
order.tips_tip1: 1) All fields are optional, but providing details like color and size ‚Äî or a description for complex products ‚Äî speeds up processing.
order.tips_tip2: 2) The more specific your specs, the more accurately we purchase and the faster we ship, avoiding delays from missing info.
order.tips_tip3: 3) When you enter a price in any currency, the system calculates the SAR value automatically. If left blank, we calculate it manually and reply in your order page.
order.tips_tip4: 4) After clicking "Submit Order" you'll be taken to your order page ‚Äî the most important page for tracking your order status.
order.tips_tip5: 5) Attaching images or files is optional but recommended for complex products. One file per product is allowed, with a maximum of 10 files before submission. After submitting, you can add unlimited files from inside your order page. Supported formats: images, PDF, Excel ‚Äî max 2 MB per file.
order.tips_tip6: 6) Don't forget to click the "Submit" button at the bottom of the page to save and register your order.
order.tips_tip7: 7) To clear all entered data and start fresh, click the "Clear all products" link at the bottom of the page.
order.url_placeholder: Paste a product link, or describe the product if no link

orders.auto_comment_no_price:
Thank you for your order!

No product prices were entered. Our team will calculate the order value and notify you here on this page as soon as possible.

For enquiries, please reply in the comments or contact us via WhatsApp: 00966556063500
orders.auto_comment_with_price:
Dear customer, thank you for your order!

Estimated order value (initial invoice ‚Äî excludes shipping):

Products value: :subtotal SAR
Wasetzon commission: :commission SAR
Total (purchase + commission): :total SAR

Purchasing will begin once the amount is received.

Note: The above value is calculated automatically by the system. You will be notified if there is any discrepancy.

For enquiries, please reply in the comments or contact us via WhatsApp: 00966556063500
payment.account_details_soon: Account details will be available soon. To transfer via this bank, please contact us directly.
payment.alert_body: Please inform us of the paid amount and the receiving bank by replying to your order or sending a message via WhatsApp or email after completing the transfer to confirm payment and start processing your order (no receipt is required unless requested by the team).
payment.alert_form_hint: You can also notify us via this simple form with a click of a button:
payment.intl_credit_card: Credit Card payment option is available to all our customers.
payment.intl_note: We continually try to secure all available payment methods for our valued customers. Please check this page periodically to view all available payment options.
payment.intl_options_title: Payment Options for Customers Outside Saudi Arabia
payment.intl_paypal: PayPal payment service is available to our customers residing in Europe, Australia, and North America.
payment.step_1: Choose the most suitable payment method for you from the options above
payment.step_2: Transfer the required amount according to the invoice sent to you
payment.step_3: Keep the payment receipt or a screenshot of the transaction
payment.step_4: Send the payment receipt to the support team via WhatsApp or email
payment.step_5: Wait for payment confirmation to begin processing your order (usually within a few hours)
payment.subtitle: Choose the most suitable payment method to complete your order
payment.team_ready: Our team is ready to assist you with any inquiries
payment.title: Available Payment Methods
shipping.billable_weight_is_the_greater: Billable weight is the greater of actual and dimensional weight
shipping.calculate_international_shippin: Calculate international shipping cost from USA to Saudi Arabia
shipping.contact_us_and_our_team: Contact us and our team will help you
shipping.enter_weight: Enter weight in KG or Grams
shipping.for_orders_requiring_domestic_u: For orders requiring domestic US shipping to our warehouse
shipping.note_1: Prices are approximate and may slightly vary.
shipping.note_2: The billable weight is the greater of actual and dimensional weight.
shipping.note_3: Prices do not include customs duties or taxes in the destination country.
shipping.note_4: Additional fuel surcharges may apply from the carrier.
shipping.note_5: Carriers may adjust their rates without prior notice.
shipping.numbers_format_hint: Field accepts English or Arabic numerals and decimals ‚Äî e.g. 3.6
shipping.this_is_an_estimate_final: This is an estimate. Final price is confirmed once the order is complete.

errors.404.title: Page Not Found
errors.404.paragraph: The link you followed doesn't exist or may have been moved.
errors.403.title: Access Denied
errors.403.paragraph: You don't have permission to view this page. If you think this is a mistake, please contact support.
errors.404.en.paragraph: The link you followed doesn't exist or may have been moved.

errors.500.paragraph: We're working to fix the issue. Try refreshing the page, or come back later.
email.order_intro: Thank you for trusting Wasetzon! Your order has been received and our team will review it shortly.
email.footer: You can track your order anytime from your orders page. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us via WhatsApp.

emails.layout.footer: This email was sent automatically by Wasetzon. If you did not request this, you can ignore this message.
email.welcome.subject: Welcome to Wasetzon!
email.welcome.intro: We're glad you've joined the Wasetzon family! Your account is ready and you can start shopping from global stores with ease.
email.welcome.action1_desc: Paste a product link from any global store and we'll handle the rest
